subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] How rude!
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Seems some people have really big egos. A lot of people have
"moderate-sized" egos and don't make waves. A very very few people I
know have almost no ego and are almost too altruistic.

I see this in a lot of areas - not only in the ghost box and paranormal
field but also in the free energy field (which might actually be considered
an area of the paranormal).
Zack

>  Frank-S
